threshold_description: Fixed 0.5 vol-point term structure slope threshold for Phase-0 sanity test. Not used in Phase-1 or production.
description: VRP-TermStructure Phase-0 signal test (SHORT-ONLY): Short VX1 when (VX2 - VX1) > 0.5, else flat. Backwardation indicates crisis regime, no entry.
rationale: Contango (VX2 > VX1) indicates strong downward roll pressure → short-vol bias. Backwardation (VX1 > VX2) indicates crisis regime → flatten/neutralize exposure.
